mapper.insert: insert into APPROVAL ( empno, appdivno, title, content, maccp, faccp, apprfilename, filepath ) values ( #{empno }, #{ appdivno}, #{ title }, #{ content }, #{ maccp }, #{ faccp }, #{ apprfilename }, #{ filepath })
mapper.select: select e.empno, e.name, d.depname from EMPLOYEE e, DEPARTMENT d where e.depno = d.depno and deleted ='N' and (e.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') OR d.depname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL WHERE deleted = 'N'
select divname, divfiletype from APPRDIV where APPDIVNO = #{ appdivno }
SELECT e.name FROM EMPLOYEE e, APPROVAL a WHERE a.type = #{ typeNo } AND a.maccp = e.empno
SELECT e.name FROM EMPLOYEE e, APPROVAL a WHERE a.type = #{ typeNo } AND a.faccp = e.empno
mapper.update: update APPROVAL set appaccpno = #{ appaccpno } where type = #{ typeNo }
update APPROVAL set appaccpno = #{ appaccpno }, companion = #{ companion } where type = #{ typeNo }
mapper.select: select d.divname, a.type, a.title, a.content, a.appdivno, a.empno, a.maccp, a.faccp, a.APPACCPNO, p.accepname, e.name, a.companion, e.empno AS '엠플이엠피넘' from APPRDIV d, APPROVAL a, APPROACCP p, EMPLOYEE e where a.appaccpno = p.appaccpno and a.appdivno = d.appdivno AND a.empno = e.empno AND a.deleted = 'N' AND (a.empno = #{ empno } OR a.maccp = #{ empno } OR a.faccp = #{ empno }) order by a.type DESC limit 0,5
